summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of three new admin features: (1) Enhanced Merge with side-by-side comparison, (2) Unassign from Funds capability, (3) View Investor Details from All Investors table. All features are working correctly.

issues: Console warning: nested button elements inside expandable group header - minor accessibility issue but doesn't affect functionality

passed_tests: Feature 1: Compare & Merge Modal - Side-by-side comparison shows Source 1 (Oldest) and Source 2 (Newer) columns
Feature 1: Compare & Merge Modal - Merged Result column in center with editable values
Feature 1: Compare & Merge Modal - Click on value to select which source to use
Feature 1: Compare & Merge Modal - Green highlighting shows selected source for each field
Feature 1: Compare & Merge Modal - Identity Information section expandable
Feature 1: Compare & Merge Modal - Contact & Relationship section expandable
Feature 1: Compare & Merge Modal - Investment Context section expandable
Feature 1: Compare & Merge Modal - Step 1 (Compare & Merge) and Step 2 (Assign to Funds) indicators
Feature 1: Compare & Merge Modal - Step 2 shows fund checkboxes with 'Currently Assigned' badges
Feature 1: Compare & Merge Modal - Merge & Assign button present
Feature 2: AssignToFundModal - Shows 'Current Fund Assignments' section
Feature 2: AssignToFundModal - Original fund shows 'Original' badge
Feature 2: AssignToFundModal - Original fund shows 'Cannot unassign original' text
Feature 2: AssignToFundModal - Non-original funds show 'Unassign' button
Feature 2: AssignToFundModal - Unassign button successfully removes investor from fund
Feature 2: AssignToFundModal - Success toast 'Unassigned from [Fund Name]' appears
Feature 2: AssignToFundModal - Modal refreshes to show updated assignments after unassign
Feature 3: AllInvestorsPage - Actions dropdown shows 'View Details' option
Feature 3: InvestorDetailModal - Slide-over panel opens from right side
Feature 3: InvestorDetailModal - Shows investor name and avatar
Feature 3: InvestorDetailModal - Shows Fund Assignments with count and badges
Feature 3: InvestorDetailModal - Shows Identity Information section (Title, Gender, Nationality, Age, Job Title, Sector)
Feature 3: InvestorDetailModal - Shows Contact Information section (Contact Name, Contact Title, Phone, Email)
Feature 3: InvestorDetailModal - Shows Investment Context section (Wealth, Has Invested Before, Expected Ticket, Investment Size)
Feature 3: InvestorDetailModal - Shows metadata (Created date, Updated date, Source badge)
Backend API: GET /api/admin/duplicate-investors returns duplicate groups correctly
Backend API: GET /api/investors/{id}/assignments returns fund assignments with is_legacy flag
Backend API: DELETE /api/admin/investor-fund-assignments/{id} successfully unassigns investor from fund
critical_code_review_comments: Minor: DuplicateInvestorsPage.js has nested button elements (Quick Merge and Compare & Merge buttons inside expandable button) - causes React hydration warning but doesn't break functionality
All three features properly implement admin-only access control
MergeCompareModal correctly handles two-step merge process with data combination
AssignToFundModal properly distinguishes legacy (original) assignments from new assignments
InvestorDetailModal uses Sheet component for slide-over panel - good UX pattern
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created. Used existing duplicate investor 'John Smith' (2 records in ALKNZ Fund I and Saferoad SPV) and 'Missing Ticket Corp' (assigned to 2 funds after unassign test).
context_for_next_testing_agent: Three new admin features tested and working: (1) MergeCompareModal on Duplicates page allows side-by-side comparison of duplicate records with data selection and editing, then fund assignment in Step 2. (2) AssignToFundModal now shows existing fund assignments with Unassign buttons for non-legacy assignments - legacy/original fund cannot be unassigned. (3) InvestorDetailModal is a slide-over panel accessible from All Investors page Actions dropdown showing full investor profile. 'Missing Ticket Corp' now has 2 fund assignments (ALKNZ Fund I as original, Saferoad SPV as assigned) after Test Fund was unassigned during testing.
